_isEnabled.title: Enable SCORM support
_isEnabled.description: If enabled, the plugin will try to find and track to a SCORM conformant LMS. Uncheck to switch off SCORM tracking

_shouldStoreResponses.title: Store question state
_shouldStoreResponses.description: If enabled, the user's responses to questions will be saved and restored in each session. Note: this setting should be enabled in the majority of cases

_shouldStoreAttempts.title: Store question attempt states
_shouldStoreAttempts.description: If enabled, a history of the user's responses to questions will be saved and restored in each session. Note: this setting should be disabled in the majority of cases

_shouldRecordInteractions.title: Record interactions
_shouldRecordInteractions.description: If enabled, the course will record the user's responses to questions to the cmi.interactions SCORM data fields

_onTrackingCriteriaMet.title: Tracking success status
_onTrackingCriteriaMet.description: What status to report back to the LMS when the tracking criteria are met

_onAssessmentFailure.title: Assessment failure status
_onAssessmentFailure.description: What status to report back to the LMS when the assessment is failed

_resetStatusOnLanguageChange.title: Reset status on language change
_resetStatusOnLanguageChange.description: If enabled, the the course status will be reset to 'incomplete' when the user changes the course language

_showDebugWindow.title: Enable SCORM debug window
_showDebugWindow.description: If enabled, a popup window will be shown on course launch that gives detailed information about what SCORM calls are being made. This can be very useful for debugging SCORM issues. Note that this popup window will appear automatically if the SCORM code encounters an error, even if this is set to false

_commitOnStatusChange.title: Commit data on status change
_commitOnStatusChange.description: If enabled, a 'commit' call will be made any time the lesson_status is changed

_commitOnAnyChange.title: Commit data on any change
_commitOnAnyChange.description: If enabled, a 'commit' (save all data) call will be made any time a value is changed. Note that enabling this setting may have a detrimental impact on the server and should only be used if absolutely necessary and only after careful load testing. Consider trying a lower value for 'Frequency of automatic commits' before changing this setting

_timedCommitFrequency.title: Frequency of automatic commits
_timedCommitFrequency.description: The frequency (in minutes) at which a 'commit' call should be made automatically. Set to 0 to disable automatic commits altogether

_maxCommitRetries.title: Maximum number of commit retries
_maxCommitRetries.description: If a 'commit' call fails, this setting controls how many times it should be retried before giving up and throwing an error

_commitRetryDelay.title: Commit retry delay
_commitRetryDelay.description: How much of a delay (in milliseconds) to leave between commit retries

_suppressErrors.title: Supress LMS errors
_suppressErrors.description: If enabled, error messages will not be displayed when SCORM tracking problems occur

_commitOnVisibilityChangeHidden.title: Commit when browser tab is hidden
_commitOnVisibilityChangeHidden.description: If enabled, a 'commit' call will be made whenever the course window is hidden/minimised. Requires a browser that supports the 'visibilitychange' event

_manifestIdentifier.title: Manifest identifier
_manifestIdentifier.description: Sets the 'identifier' attribute in the imsmanifest.xml
